dns.desc: If you set custom DNS servers, any domain names will be resolved through the DNS servers set here instead of the one obtained from Ethernet, repeater, cellular, tethering or VPN configuration DNS servers.
dns.rebinding_tips: Turning on this option may cause private DNS lookup failure. If your network has a captive portal please disable this option.
dns.override_label: Override DNS Settings for All Clients
dns.override_tips: If enabled, your router will override unencrypted DNS settings for all clients.
dns.v1_tips: The router uses the v1 version of DNS. Only some encrypted DNS servers are supported.
dns.server_tips: You can choose up to 8 servers. The router will automatically choose the fastest server among them.
dns.host_tips: Requests from clients will be firstly resolved using the static DNS rules you have written in Hosts.
dns.adguardhome_in_use_tips: AdGuard Home is enabled, the router must use the DNS server provided by AdGuard Home, you can't customize DNS servers.
dns.server_warning_tips: The server suspected to be expired.
